description: This CSS file contains styles and theme management for a React application, defining variables and styles for both light and dark themes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, sets primary background and text colors.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component of the application, styles and centers the content.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo component of the application, with animations.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link component styled for theme integration.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for switching between light and dark themes.
